about_the_game:
Aircraft War, now with Car Wars continue to have fun.
The game adds more excitement to you with 5 different maps with different player cars and enemy cars.
You can also play co-op on the same computer screen as your friend.
It's not over, you can fight your friend from the same computer again.
Shoot down enemy cars with your friend with the co-op option and complete missions by helping together.
Or, you can choose versus and try to shoot each other with your friend.
Whoever shoots the other more wins.

Aircraft War, now with Car Wars continue to have fun.
The game adds more excitement to you with 5 different maps with different player cars and enemy cars.
You can also play co-op on the same computer screen as your friend.
It's not over, you can fight your friend from the same computer again.
Shoot down enemy cars with your friend with the co-op option and complete missions by helping together.
Or, you can choose versus and try to shoot each other with your friend.
Whoever shoots the other more wins.
name: Aircraft War: Car Wars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: intel pentium 4
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 Mb and Directx 9 supported and Pixel Shader version 1.1 Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: In order for the game to work, .net framework 4.0, Directx 9 And Xna Game Framework 4.0, Access Database Engine must be installed.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Ultimate
  • Processor: intel core2 duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 Mb and Directx 9 supported and Pixel Shader version 1.1 Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: In order for the game to work, .net framework 4.0, Directx 9 And Xna Game Framework 4.0, Access Database Engine must be installed.

short_description: Aircraft War, now with Car Wars continue to have fun. The game adds more excitement to you with 5 different maps with different player cars and enemy cars. You can also play co-op on the same computer screen as your friend. Or, you can choose versus and try to shoot each other with your friend.
supported_languages: English, Turkish, Russian, French, Italian, German, Hungarian, Portuguese - Portugal, Greek, Swedish
